valueString: Using this patient's age, gender, and serum creatinine value of 1.4,.  Estimated GFR = 52 if non African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  Estimated GFR = 63 if African-American (mL/min/1.73 m2).  For comparison, mean GFR for age group 60-69 is 85 (mL/min/1.73 m2).  GFR<60 = Chronic Kidney Disease, GFR<15 = Kidney Failure.
